ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Arrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Arrest is the 3rd rune needed for the lvl 34 Nullify Magic spell (along with Consumption and Sorcery). Sophist ... From: Lomack  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Arrest is the 3rd rune needed for the lvl 34 Nullify Magic spell (along with
Consumption and Sorcery).

Sophist


-----Original Message-----
From: Lomack <lomack@...>

Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Rune of Arrest


>From: Lomack <lomack@...>

>
